name: ?bank
tagline: ?bank is the technological bank which helps customers do less banking works yet get more benefits.
description:
?bank is the technological bank which brings our customers the paperless & effortless access to high yield current accounts & instant access to lending products. Banking with us is all about getting lots more benefits and doing a lot less of banking works.
- Automatic saving that earns high interest rate from all money staying in the account.
- Just few-swipe-away access to instant loans.
- Paperless, effortless & brief process to get you going.
